name: Prokuvo
description:
An authentic, action-packed Slava simulator.

Tuned for absolute realism.

Host your demanding guests and answer to their wishes in hectic local multiplayer.

Inspired by Overcooked.

Originally made for GGJ 2019. Improved in December 2019.

Made by:

Ivan Notaroš - code
Vukašin Stančević - graphics, sound
Sava Minić - code
Original theme song by Slobodan Stević
